New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit the first postseason home run of his MLB career.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani blasted a 372-foot three-run home run in the second inning.
Xander Bogaerts hit a two-run double in the third inning.
Teoscar Hernandez drove in two runs with a single in the fourth inning.
Blake Treinen struck out Manny Machado to clinch the win in the ninth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Shohei Ohtani expressed his enjoyment of the game and acknowledged the challenge of hitting off a good pitcher.
Teoscar Hernandez praised Shohei Ohtani's performance and expressed gratitude for having him on the team.
